name: EMG
description: Emg is a human resources management firm that assists businesses and organizations with meeting their human resources, regulatory compliance and legal needs. With our assistance, your business will have its own HR department, along with its own in-house counsel for legal representation and assistance with regulatory compliance. We have over seven years of experience in public and private sector regulatory compliance, and over five years of experience in human resources, employment law, and immigration law. We understand that each client is unique. Therefore, we deliver custom solutions, tailored to you - your industry, your culture, and your one-of-a-kind challenges. We offer hourly, daily, and contractual services.
features: strive to help businesses develop and maintain an effective workforce.
improve productivity, company culture, and employee relations.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: to assist small businesses with organizational effectiveness through human capital management.
ShortDescription: Emg is a human resources management firm that assists businesses and organizations with meeting their human resources, regulatory compliance and legal needs. With our assistance, your business will have its own HR department, along with its own in-house counsel for legal representation and assistance with regulatory compliance.

Highlights.name: TAILORED EXPERTISE:
Highlights.description: Whether you're an individual, entrepreneur, or organization, our specialized knowledge in human resources, strategic planning, learning + career development, and leadership effectiveness is tailored to meet your unique needs.

Highlights.name: COLLABORATIVE APPROACH:
Highlights.description: We prioritize collaboration and relationship-building, creating opportunities for trust, authentic connections, and community. Through coaching, training, and consulting, we cultivate supportive environments for leadership and learning

Highlights.name: PROVEN SUCCESS:
Highlights.description: With a track record of delivering tangible results across various industries, we empower you to achieve your goals and excel personally, professionally, and organizationally.

enhanced_description: EMG is a human resources management firm established in 2013, headquartered in Philadelphia, PA. It specializes in assisting businesses and organizations of all sizes, from small to large and global enterprises, with their human resources, regulatory compliance, and legal needs. EMG effectively serves as an outsourced HR department, providing in-house counsel for legal representation and regulatory assistance. The firm offers tailored solutions leveraging its specialized knowledge in human resources, strategic planning, learning and career development, and leadership effectiveness. With over seven years of experience in public and private sector regulatory compliance and over five years in HR, employment law, and immigration law, EMG helps clients develop effective workforces, improve productivity, enhance company culture, and foster employee relations. Services are offered on an hourly, daily, or contractual basis, emphasizing a collaborative approach to achieve tangible results.
key_use_cases: Ensuring regulatory compliance (public and private sector)
Providing legal representation and assistance (employment law, immigration law)
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
competitive_advantages: Custom solutions tailored to industry, culture, and specific challenges
Extensive experience in public and private sector regulatory compliance, HR, employment law, and immigration law
Integrated support with in-house counsel for legal representation and regulatory compliance
Collaborative approach prioritizing relationship-building and trust
Proven track record of delivering tangible results across various industries

Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Achievement of personal, professional, and organizational goals
primary_users: HR leaders and departments within client organizations
compliance_features: Regulatory compliance assistance (public and private sector)
